headline.main: CONFERENCE IN ROME TO DIVIDE UP RUSSIA; Prime Question Is to Give Italy Enough to Continue in War

lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 19 -- Conversations began here today between Dr. Wilhelm Funk, Germany's Minister of Economics, and Raffaelo Riccardi, the Italian Minister of Foreign Exchange, to reach what was believed to be a preliminary understanding on the form and extent of Italy's share in the exploitation of the resources of the Russian territory conquered by the German Army.
